name: BE CAPTIVATED BY THE BEAUTY OF MAYON VOLCANO
description:
Mayon Volcano was considered as an active volcano which is famous for its perfect cone-shape. It’s an iconic landmark of Albay, one of the province of Bicol Region with an elevation of 2,460 meters(8,077 ft). With its captivating
beauty, no wonder many tourists from all over the world would like to see this
natural wonder of Albay.
